plot: Tells the story of the relationship between Luis and his best friend. If the partner of the greatest moments in your life is burning you without knowing it, would you step away?
title: Cigarro
plot_es: Tells the story of the relationship between Luis and his best friend. If the partner of the greatest moments in your life is burning you without knowing it, would you step away?
plot_en: Tells the story of the relationship between Luis and his best friend. If the partner of the greatest moments in your life is burning you without knowing it, would you step away?
